member.name: F:Arex388.Kraken.ChromaSampling.FourTwoZero
member.summary: Kraken.io's default for lossy JPEG compression. Suitable for most images - this sampling scheme will yield the smallest possible file size.

member.name: F:Arex388.Kraken.ChromaSampling.FourTwoTwo
member.summary: The two colour (chroma) components are sampled at half the sample rate of brightness (luma), thereby halving the horizontal chroma resolution.

member.name: F:Arex388.Kraken.ChromaSampling.FourFourFour
member.summary: Each of the three colour components have the same sample rate as the luma channel, thus there is no chroma subsampling taking place. Use this scheme to disable chroma subsampling for the highest quality result, at the expense of a slightly larger file size.

member.name: F:Arex388.Kraken.CropMode.Bottom
member.summary: South / Bottom

member.name: F:Arex388.Kraken.CropMode.BottomLeft
member.summary: South West / Bottom Left

member.name: F:Arex388.Kraken.CropMode.BottomRight
member.summary: South East / Bottom Right

member.name: F:Arex388.Kraken.CropMode.Center
member.summary: Center - this is the default gravity or direction, and applied when the crop_mode parameter is left out, or an invalid value is passed.

member.name: F:Arex388.Kraken.CropMode.East
member.summary: East / Right

member.summary: West / Left

member.summary: North East / Top Right

member.summary: North West / Top Left

member.summary: East / Right

member.summary: North / Top

member.name: F:Arex388.Kraken.Metadata.Copyright
member.summary:
Will preserve copyright entries. The following tags will be preserved (if present):
- Exif.Image.Copyright - Iptc.Application2.Copyright - Xmp.dc.creator - Xmp.dc.rights - Xmp.photoshop.Credit

member.name: F:Arex388.Kraken.Metadata.Date
member.summary:
Will preserve image creation date. The following tags will be preserved (if present):
- Exif.Photo.DateTimeDigitized - Exif.Photo.DateTimeOriginal - Xmp.photoshop.DateCreated

member.name: F:Arex388.Kraken.Metadata.Geotag
member.summary:
Will preserve location-specific information. The following tags will be preserved (if present):
- Exif.GPSInfo.GPSLatitude - Exif.GPSInfo.GPSLatitudeRef - Exif.GPSInfo.GPSLongitude - Exif.GPSInfo.GPSLongitudeRef - Exif.GPSInfo.GPSVersionID

member.name: F:Arex388.Kraken.Metadata.Orientation
member.summary:
Will preserve the orientation (rotation) mark. The following tag will be preserved (if present):
- Exif.Image.Orientation

member.name: F:Arex388.Kraken.Metadata.Profile
member.summary: Will preserve the ICC colour profile. ICC colour profile information adds unnecessary bloat to images. However, preserving it can be necessary in extremely rare cases where removing this information could lead to a change in brightness and/or saturation of the resulting file.

member.name: F:Arex388.Kraken.ResizeStrategy.Auto
member.summary: The best strategy (portrait or landscape) will be selected according to its aspect ratio.

member.name: F:Arex388.Kraken.ResizeStrategy.Crop
member.summary: This option will crop an image to the exact size you specify. The resulting cropped image can optionally be scaled by inclusion of a scale, which accepts a number representing the percentage by which the image should be scaled.

member.name: F:Arex388.Kraken.ResizeStrategy.Exact
member.summary: Resize to exact width and height. Aspect ratio will not be maintained.

member.name: F:Arex388.Kraken.ResizeStrategy.Fill
member.summary: This strategy allows you to resize the image to fit the specified bounds while preserving the aspect ratio. The optional background property allows you to specify a color which will be used to fill the unused portions of the previously specified bounds.

member.name: F:Arex388.Kraken.ResizeStrategy.Fit
member.summary: This option will crop and resize your images to fit the desired width and height.

member.name: F:Arex388.Kraken.ResizeStrategy.Landscape
member.summary: Exact width will be set, height will be adjusted according to aspect ratio.

member.name: F:Arex388.Kraken.ResizeStrategy.Portrait
member.summary: Exact height will be set, width will be adjusted according to aspect ratio.

member.name: F:Arex388.Kraken.ResizeStrategy.Square
member.summary: This strategy will crop the image by its shorter dimension to make it a square, then resize it to the specified size.

member.name: F:Arex388.Kraken.KrakenClient.MaxResizeCount
member.summary: The maximum number of resizes allowed for an optimization.

member.name: P:Arex388.Kraken.Authorization.Access
member.summary: Your Kraken.io API access key.

member.name: P:Arex388.Kraken.Authorization.Secret
member.summary: Your Kraken.io API secret key.

member.name: P:Arex388.Kraken.Convert.BackgroundColor
member.summary: Background image when converting from transparent file formats like PNG or GIF into fully opaque format like JPEG. The background property can be passed in HEX notation "#f60" or "#ff6600", RGB "rgb(255, 0, 0)" or RGBA "rgba(91, 126, 156, 0.7)". The default background color is white.

member.name: P:Arex388.Kraken.Convert.Format
member.summary:
The image format you wish to convert your image into. This can accept one of the following values:
- jpeg - png - gif

member.name: P:Arex388.Kraken.Convert.PreserveExtension
member.summary: A boolean value (true or false) instructing Kraken API whether or not the original extension should be kept in the output filename. For example when converting "image.jpg" into PNG format with this flag turned on the output image name will still be "image.jpg" even though the image has been converted into a PNG. The default value is false meaning the correct extension will always be set.

member.name: P:Arex388.Kraken.OptimizeRequest.AutoOrient
member.summary: Flag indicating if the source image should be auto-oriented. True by default.

member.name: P:Arex388.Kraken.OptimizeRequest.CallbackUrl
member.summary: The callback url that will be notified when the optimization is complete.

member.name: P:Arex388.Kraken.OptimizeRequest.ChromaSampling
member.summary: The chroma sampling to apply during resize. 4:2:0 by default.

member.name: P:Arex388.Kraken.OptimizeRequest.Convert
member.summary: The kraked image's target format.

member.name: P:Arex388.Kraken.OptimizeRequest.Lossy
member.summary: Flag indicating if lossy optimization should be used. True by default.

member.name: P:Arex388.Kraken.OptimizeRequest.MetadataToPreserve
member.summary: A collection indicating which metadata to preserve from the source image.

member.name: P:Arex388.Kraken.OptimizeRequest.Quality
member.summary: The quality (0-100) to apply during resize (optional).

member.name: P:Arex388.Kraken.OptimizeRequest.Resize
member.summary: A collection of resize targets to apply during optimization.

member.name: P:Arex388.Kraken.OptimizeRequest.Url
member.summary: The source image's URL.

member.name: P:Arex388.Kraken.OptimizeRequest.Wait
member.summary: Flag indicating if the request is synchronous or asynchronous.

member.name: P:Arex388.Kraken.OptimizeRequest.WebP
member.summary: Flag indicating if the kraked image should be in the WebP format. False by default.
